definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
clear (of liquid)/limpid/to clarify/to make sth clear/to be clear (about the facts)
to settle (of liquid)/to become clear (by precipitation of impurities)/precipitate (chemistry)/to put in order/to quell disturbances

sentences.english: You can let me out here, Topper.
sentences.chinese: 上澄，讓我在這裏下車就可以了。
陳澄的研究未注意系統性。

sentences.english: Topper pulled the rig up beside them.
sentences.chinese: 上澄把他車停在了它們旁邊。

sentences.english: The sky was blue, the larks was soaring high over the green corn.
sentences.chinese: 長天一片澄藍，碧綠的莊稼上雲雀凌空穿飛。

sentences.english: The water was a deep blue and sunlight glittered on its looking glass-clear surface.
sentences.chinese: 湖水澄藍，波平如鏡，陽光照在湖上熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: They came to a house in which lived a man named Chen Cheng and his family. The whole family was crying.
sentences.chinese: 他們來到一戶叫陳澄的家中，見全家人正痛哭流涕。

sentences.english: Hao ran and Chi Cheng who grew up with different family backgrounds became good friends.
sentences.chinese: 浩然與成長背景截然不同的子澄，後來竟成了好朋友。

sentences.english: Helen ordered both fried chicken and in the fast-food restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 海倫咱快澄店裏點了炸姬和色拉。

sentences.english: Say, also saw the eye heel Feng Lin ride in the Cheng Cheng of snow eagle together.
sentences.chinese: 說着，還看了眼跟鳳麟一起騎在雪鷹上的澄澄。

sentences.english: Say, also saw the eye heel Feng Lin ride in the Cheng Cheng of snow eagle together.
sentences.chinese: 說着，還看了眼跟鳳麟一起騎在雪鷹上的澄澄。

sentences.english: Han, 27, thinks her parents know she is a lesbian.
sentences.chinese: 27歲的韓心澄認爲她的父母知道她是同性戀。

definition: clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
bright/luminous/white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)
